$ul: **conditions**: Scope of this rule, e.g. moves at or away from a specific location or towards a specific location.
**enabled**: Whether this rule should be in effect (`true`) or on hold (`false`).
**label**: A name or a label for this resource. This is used in the user interface, may be empty.
**parameters**: Parameters for this rule; depends on the rule type. Refer to the rule type specification for details.
**time_created**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was created.
**time_updated**: [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) formatted string for when this resource was updated.
**type**: The type of location rule to be applied.
